title: The Tale of the Ghost Eyes - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Drama   Fantasy   Historical   Horror   Martial Arts   Supernatural
tags: Child Protagonist   Daoism   Ghosts   Male Protagonist   Spirits   Weak to Strong   Zombies
author: 骑马钓鱼
description: A Taoist master must visit a village to fight off the hauntings and killings that have taken hold of the village. The powerful master learns of a young boy that has gained the ability to see ghosts and takes his role in the young boy’s destiny. Join the adventure of the Taoist master and the boy with the ghost eyes.>
